website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung 20mm NX Pancake Lens provides a classic wide-angle field of view, but you'll have to stop down to f/4 to get sharp photos.

customer_reviews.title: Like new - truth in advertising
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for Christmas. I love that it was in such great condition and a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: catbarnes09

customer_reviews.title: Must have lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lens to cut down on the bulk of the 18-55 kit lens. Images are excellent and the autofocus is quick. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carl E. Sims

customer_reviews.title: When I go on vacation or to a party of some sort I can easily keep it in my coat pocket and not have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lens for its slim design. When I go on vacation or to a party of some sort I can easily keep it in my coat pocket and not have it around my neck all the time
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Piscicelli Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A nice lens for the NX300
customer_reviews.text: A nice, good quality, fast focus acquisition, solid, good field of view lens. The Fn button on the lens is redundant, but nice. If purchased, the 30mm should be a bit flatter as it does not have the Fn button. This lens take a 43mm filter, the OEM 20-50mm lens takes a 40.5mm filter. This can be confusing as my previous experience with several SLR/D-SLR cameras filters have generally been of the same size, except for speciality lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: Useful focal length, pretty sharp optics
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd lens I bought for NX10 (first one being the kit zoom, second one the 30mm "wide normal" pancake), and I have a feeling it will be a permanent fixture on my NX10. For street photography, this is a greatly welcomed focal length (equivalent to 30mm in 35mm-photography). 28mm-equivalent would be a little too wide, and my other "wide normal" pancake with 45mm-equivalency is too narrow. There are some pincushion-effect distortions, which is something I do like in a wide lens, but not drastic. The picture resolution is great - pretty sharp. Since I bought this lens, the other two lenses have been collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Lan Acane

customer_reviews.title: This lens adds to the NX capabilities
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner photographer I found that this lens works great for indoor low light portrait situations. In many instances it obviates the need for the use of flash. In addition it slims down the camera to the point that it is quite easy and convenient to bring along to indoor family events or where portrait photography is common. Extremely satisfied with quality, easy of use, and value for the money. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Its a good lens but not any better then the kit lens
customer_reviews.text: Yes there is lower distortion in this lens then in the kit lens but for most people it not really worth the extra money. If you are a lens snob then you will find it to be a very decent lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Maiser

customer_reviews.title: Love this Lense.
customer_reviews.text: Boo hoo. This lense was FANTASTIC. Wider ranger, but not fisheye effect. The boohoo is because I left my camera and this lense in the airport and no kind person returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Raine

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably sharp... when in focus.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this is the fault of the camera (NX300), or the lens. However, I found that when I used it in any of the AF modes, it would not hit focus at the intended point. Without the ability to fine tune these lenses, I found this one to be out of spec IMO. That and the fact that it is only an F2.8 lens make it a 3 - 3.5 star lens to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dwegs

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: Great quality clear and hige definition of pictures with this pancake lens, but better the Samsung camera, incredible photos. I recommend totaly
customer_reviews.author: Opus01

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: This lens has been the perfect companion for my Samsung NX100 camera. Perfect focal length for take-anywhere photography. The image quality is very respectable. The focus is a bit on the slow side but not a deal breaker. Overall, great value for the money and makes photography fun.
customer_reviews.author: Digiko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep the DSLR camera in the girl purse.
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooooooo much convenience to keep the camera in my purse and be with me any moment I need a great camera to get the picture. Plus the lense itself gives you the wide length to your picture. You will like it so much once you use it. I promise you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Samsung 20mm NX Pancake lens for NX Series Cameras
product_meta.description:
Samsung EX-W20NB Lens-20mm-F2.8-Pancake

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The portable Samsung EX-W20NB 20mm NX i-Function pancake lens is an all-purpose wide-angle lens that works with Samsung NX mount cameras. The lens has a maximum aperture of F/2.8 for sharp shots even in lower-light situations. Featuring Samsung's intuitive i-Function, it gives you quick and easy access to manual settings, so you get exactly the shot you want.

i-Function offers one-touch access to your camera's manual settings. View larger.

Fixed 20mm focal length is versatile for use as a walk-around lens you can leave on your camera. View larger.

20MM WIDE FOCAL LENGTH AND F/2.8 MAXIMUM APERTURE
This lens has a fixed 20mm (equivalent to 30.8mm in 35mm format) focal length, making it versatile and an ideal walk-around lens you can leave on your camera. The moderately wide focal length means you can fit more into a picture without the perspective change that often comes with ultra-wide-angle lenses. The lens has an F/2.8 maximum aperture for taking photos in lower-light situations. 

ONE-TOUCH ACCESS TO CONTROLS WITH I-FUNCTION
Samsung's i-Function feature gives you easy one-touch access to your camera's manual settings. You'll be able to adjust shutter speed, aperture, and more with just a push of a button and twist of the lens. You'll even be able to preview the settings in real time, so you can see how the settings affect your shot before you take it. Whether you're an expert or enthusiast, the intuitive i-Function feature will give you professional results. 

COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT FOR CARRYING EVERYWHERE
The EX-W20NB is incredibly compact, making it a great walk-around lens for the photographer who needs flexibility and portability. The compact size preserves the slim profile of NX series cameras, and the weight of less than 3 ounces makes it easy to carry everywhere. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung EX-W20NB 20mm pancake lens for NX mount cameras. 

EX-W20NB 20MM LENS
AT A GLANCE:
 * 20mm (30.8mm equivalent) lens for Samsung NX mount cameras
 * F/2.8 maximum aperture
 * i-Function for quick access to manual settings
 * Lightweight, compact design for portability
 * Fast and accurate autofocus
